comments.body: Note for review: this changeset does introduce a small behaviour change; the `PrintWarning` function will now be called if the config file fails to open, whereas no `else` condition is present in the version at line https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/37187/files#diff-930e2e7e309763acbb831b1cc081a2a76c92e2a3d0be150a9e933bdc7a1747f0L272
